title: Factory-ts improvements
description: Various improvements to add to the project and the factory-ts package

features.title: Agents require a search-files tool
features.description:
The agent calls the tool with a list of keywords, the whole project file system is searched and if any of them are found in a given file it will be returned in a final list.
The result is the list of relative file paths.

features.title: For standard agent suppliers - discover the latest prices
features.description:
It must be possible to view the latest prices per model and refresh them via a configurable link to the given supplier's website. Store the latest ones in a local file that is read on app start.
Right now the costs are always 0 - the tokens are not counted anywhere, they should be.

features.title: the word dependencies in Features and Tasks should be changed to 'blockers'
features.description: This change should be reflected in any file that uses 'dependencies'

features.title: Make an Agent run chat display prettier
features.description:
make the thoughts as a bubble, and then the tool calls as expandable rows to view the details (mainly for read_files & write_file - the rest of the tools are short enough that they can always display).
Same goes for the responses to the LLM - apply a similar view as above.

features.title: Agent run costs and times are always empty
features.description: It seems these are either not recorded correctly or not passed, so that they cannot be viewed properly inside @AgentsView.tsx and @AllAgentsView.tsx

features.title: The "Run Agent" button should be standardised
Persist locally agent runs
features.description: Make sure the history of agent runs is persisted and read when app is started

features.title: IconDelete
features.description: `IconDelete` inside @Icons.tsx needs to actually be a proper delete icon

features.title: running an agent causes an error when it tries to make a local copy of the project
features.description: shouldIgnoreCopy inside @orchestrator.ts should ignore all sorts of files and folders specific to typescript, node, electron.

features.title: Make the Context Files selection better
features.description:
1) the Add chip becomes huge once there's even just 1 file (it scales in height to match it). That shouldn't be the case.
2) when the FileSelector opens - it should auto focus into the search input box so a user can start typing right away
3) in the FileDisplay and FileSelector - instead of showing a generic document icon, let's try to use a meaningful type extension icon - if need be, create a folder with such common icons to use.
4) The FileDisplay - should show the icon centered to the left. The name in the middle. 
The file size small at the bottom.
The last modification date at the top right.
And the delete button is correct where it is now.

features.title: If any of a task's features are rejected (showing the exclamation circle) so should the task
features.description: The way this displays should follow exactly how Features are displayed inside TaskDetailsView

features.title: When running the orchestrator, finding the next feature for a task should be based on the feature index
features.description: the Task.featureIdToDisplayIndex is the means by which the features should be sorted for this.

features.title: Go over all the tasks in this project and update inline file references
Standardise the Delete, Edit, Add, Create buttons
features.description:
wherever there's a button that just says Delete we should have it use the standard `DeleteIcon`
wherever there's a button that just says Add or Create we should have it use the standard `PlusIcon`
wherever there's a button that just says Edit we should have it use the standard `EditIcon`

features.title: Agents - run histories UI improvements
Toasts should animate
features.description:
Toasts need to slide down with an animation when appearing and slide up when hiding.
They need to be snappy. It should also be possible to flick them up to make them disappear (like notifications on a mobile device).
features.rejection: Toasts only seem to animate on the user flick up - they should animate always. The animation needs to be fluid and appealing to the eye.

features.title: Run agent button long press
features.description: When the new Run Agent button is long pressed it should show an agent type selector - upon selection it runs with that selected agent. Normal click runs the 'developer' agent like now.
features.rejection: It's still possible to drag the whole feature row (this is inside @src/renderer/tasks/TaskDetailsView.tsx ).

features.title: TaskCard missing RunAgent on hover
features.description:
@src/renderer/components/tasks/TaskCard.tsx should have the "Run Agent" button in the top right.
Same as in @src/renderer/tasks/TasksListView.tsx if the task has a running agent - show the status.

features.title: ChatsManager should not have any agentic tools - everything should be routed through factory-ts
features.description: the factory-ts package should be the one place where all agentic tools are placed - currently @src/chat/manager.js has its own functions. Those should be cleaned up and used appropriately from factory-ts.

features.title: When running an agent - all the GIT credentials are not found in the @.env
features.description:
There is a .env file both in this project and in factory-ts.
Just like in the python counterpart ( the files @packages/factory-ts/blueprint/run_local_agent.py and @packages/factory-ts/blueprint/git_manager.py ) the GIT credentials must be loaded from the workspaces `.env` file in the root of the project.

features.title: Agent Run - UI fix
features.description: When viewing an agent run inside @src/renderer/screens/AgentsView.tsx it doesn't show the whole conversation. Just the last message. This needs to be fixed to show the full conversation.

features.title: FileMentions should be renamed RichText
features.description: This component should then be used inside Chat and inside agent runs where messages are displayed.

features.title: No edit button in Tasks and Features
features.description:
In @src/renderer/tasks/TaskDetailsView.tsx Clicking a feature should open the edit feature form - the edit button shouldn't show.
In @src/renderer/screens/TasksView.tsx Tasks already open on click - there should just be no edit button present.

features.title: When an agent runs - there's a duplicate history run
features.description: The Electron app has its own local history run, but when the agent runs on the copy of the project - it also produces a history run. This shouldn't happen - only the original app where the agent was started should create the history run.

features.title: The agent persona markdown files are too bloated.
features.description:
These files contain the tool specs, but those are yet again repeated in the overall tool spec in the orchestrator.
These files shouldn't have the list of tools available, but the tool descriptions provided by the orchestrator should contain extra comments as to what each tool does (similarly to how each agent's markdown persona file has it).

features.title: The main FILE_ORGANISATION.md is bloated
features.description:
This file is always included and it contains irrelevant information.
Agents are asked to update this file, but they seem to always add extra unimportant info.
This needs to be tightened and made sure that the instructions for editing the file are clear, and all edits are succinct and precise.
The file should contain overall pointers to the project - not detailed descriptions of each file.
It should not be a log of changes.
